mapper.select: SELECT idx, sendUser, receiveUser, title, content, status, date_format(createdAt, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') as createdAt FROM post WHERE sendUser = #{sendUser} ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT idx, sendUser, receiveUser, title, content, status, date_format(createdAt, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') as createdAt FROM post WHERE receiveUser = #{receiveUser} ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (sendUser, receiveUser, title, content) VALUES (#{sendUser}, #{receiveUser}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET status = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx}
